org.hps.monitoring.ecal.eventdisplay.io

Interface EventManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    LCIOManager, TextManager

    public interface EventManager
    Interface EventManager is responsible for traversing an event data file and extracting lists of calorimeter hits and hit clusters from it to be passed to a FileViewer.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void close()
      close

      public void close()

      Closes the event manager.
      List<Cluster> getClusters()
      getClusters

      Allows access to the current event's list of clusters.

      Gets the ordinal number for the currently displayed event.

      getHits

      public ArrayList getHits()

      Allows access to the current event's list of hits.
      boolean nextEvent()
      nextEvent

      public boolean nextEvent()

      Populates the event manager with hits and clusters from the next event.
      boolean previousEvent()
      previousEvent

      public boolean previousEvent()

      Populates the event manager with hits and clusters from the previous event.

    • Method Detail

      • close

        void close()
    throws IOException
        close

        public void close()

        Closes the event manager. Once this is performed, no additional events may be read.
        Throws:
        IOException - Occurs if there is an error closing the file stream.

      • getEventNumber

        int getEventNumber()
        getEventNumber

        public int getEventNumber()

        Gets the ordinal number for the currently displayed event.
        Returns:
        Returns the current event's ordinal number.

      • getClusters

        List<Cluster> getClusters()
        getClusters

        public ArrayList getClusters()

        Allows access to the current event's list of clusters.
        Returns:
        Returns the current clusters as an ArrayList object.

      • getHits

        List<EcalHit> getHits()
        getHits

        public ArrayList getHits()

        Allows access to the current event's list of hits.
        Returns:
        Returns the current hits as an ArrayList object.

      • nextEvent

        boolean nextEvent()
           throws IOException
        nextEvent

        public boolean nextEvent()

        Populates the event manager with hits and clusters from the next event.
        Returns:
        Returns true if an event was read and false if it was not.
        Throws:
        IOException - Occurs if there was a file read error.

      • previousEvent

        boolean previousEvent()
               throws IOException
        previousEvent

        public boolean previousEvent()

        Populates the event manager with hits and clusters from the previous event.
        Returns:
        Returns true if an event was read and false if it was not.
        Throws:
        IOException - Occurs if there was a file read error.
